About Local Weather
Overview

View local weather conditions and extended forecasts for zipcodes in the USA.
Contact

If inclined, send comments, questions or criticisms to the author's e-mail or webpage.
Credits

Local Weather is made possible by free, 3rd party data and software:

  • Current condition data are supplied by Yahoo! Weather
  • Extended forecast data are supplied by rssWeather.
  • RSS feeds are parsed by XML for <SCRIPT>.
Compatibility

Local Weather has been tested with the following browsers

  • Firefox 1.5
  • Internet Explorer 6.0
  • Opera 8.51
Change History

Version 1.1 - June 7, 2006

  • Client caching to reduce the load on Yahoo and rssWeather.
  • New user preference: Set forecast to show up first instead of local conditions
  • Tweaked upper navigation bar.
